name: Clockwork Servant
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Domestic Retainer
text: The servant can cast the mending and prestidigitation cantrips at will without requiring spell components.

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The servant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
